channel.title: Ableton Link / Auxy as Midi-Controller?
channel.description:
Hi guys, so, I'm just doing this producer thing for about 2-3 months now and do not possess any technical know-how about daw's whatsoever.
Just starting on Ableton so slowly, could anyone tell me how a) Ableton link works exactly and most importantly b) if there's a possibility to set up auxy as a midi input to Ableton?
merci all the way

item.title: Ableton Link / Auxy as Midi-Controller?
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
thanks man! I appreciate that Sad that midi doesn’t work with auxy since that was my go-to-making-music-option so far.
will check the iPad software out soon. merci!

Read full topic

item.title: Ableton Link / Auxy as Midi-Controller?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
@moemx - forgot to add that there are heaps of great Ableton controllers on iOS.

Conductr

Conductr | Ableton Live & Traktor controller for iPad

Conductr is an Ableton Live and Traktor controller app for iPad. Are you a musician or a DJ? Download the trial version for free!

http://www.touch-able.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Ableton Link / Auxy as Midi-Controller?
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
I think they’ve said repeatedly that midi out is not coming anytime soon if ever because the belief is that making music with multiple apps, etc is messy and Auxy ain’t about messy. But I could be wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Ableton Link / Auxy as Midi-Controller?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
A) Ableton Link allows multiple devices to stay in sync over a local network. As an example, this allows a track you’ve made on your laptop to play in time with one you have on your phone.

B) Starting with iOS 11 you’ll be able to connect your iPhone/iPad to your computer via the lightning-to-usb cable and send 16 channels of midi in either direction. I’m unsure if this is something Auxy will support… Perhaps @Auxy could chime in?

Read full topic
